text: Mba enser ana kegap, ana fega mba khɨn kɨ kakagi mbok khɨngi. Ana ana ndi khɨngiap, mba mbok thɨma puigap, rogar ana ntorgim, ana havhargi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgirga, Satan wom za kha gumgi gu mbigi guiguigirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ana mbara kɨv kɨrim, mba 1,000 mpari vhɨzgirga, mbe zumgum wom tuga tɨvaneŋra ana fhɨrgirga.
